name: wb-starter
description: Modern website starter kit powered by WB Behaviors

scripts.test: npm run test:duplicates && npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
scripts.test:base: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=base
scripts.test:behaviors: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
scripts.test:all: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors && npx playwright test --project=performance
scripts.ci:docs-safety: npm run lint:md-powershell && npm run check:stale-locks && npm run check:critical-scripts
scripts.precommit: npm run check:critical-scripts && npm run lint:md-powershell:staged && npm run check:stale-locks

scripts-info.start: Start site (update docs manifest then run express server)
scripts-info.start:mcp: Start MCP runner (MCP + web server with health gating)
scripts-info.mcp:healthcheck: TCP health probe for MCP (used by CI/orchestration)
scripts-info.dev: Serve the repository on localhost:3000 for quick manual testing
scripts-info.test:duplicates: Detect duplicate content/assets in the repo
scripts-info.test: Run duplicates check then the full Playwright test matrix
scripts-info.test:fast: Run Playwright with early-fail (fast dev iteration)
scripts-info.test:dev: Run base + behaviors Playwright projects for local dev
scripts-info.test:async: Start the async test runner (non-blocking CI mode)
scripts-info.test:single: Run Playwright with a single worker (isolation)
scripts-info.test:base: Run compliance then base Playwright projects
scripts-info.test:behaviors: Run compliance, base and behaviors Playwright projects
scripts-info.test:mobile: Run mobile Chrome & Safari Playwright projects
scripts-info.check:staged-integrity: Check staged files for integrity issues
scripts-info.ci:docs-safety: Run all CI doc safety checks
scripts-info.pw:maybe: Run Playwright only if matching tests exist
scripts-info.precommit: Pre-commit hook: critical scripts + md lint + stale locks

author: CieloVista Software
